appsgate.lig.calendar.core.impl
Class GoogleCalendarImpl

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.calendar.core.impl.GoogleCalendarImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CoreCalendarSpec, CoreObjectSpec
public class GoogleCalendarImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CoreCalendarSpec, CoreObjectSpec

This class is used as a core calendar. An instance of this class will match a remote calendar on the cloud

Since:
May 14, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard

notifyEventAlarm

public NotificationMsg notifyEventAlarm(int type,
                                        net.fortuna.ical4j.model.component.VEvent event,
                                        net.fortuna.ical4j.model.component.VAlarm alarm)
This method uses the ApAM message model. Each call produce a AlarmNotificationMsg or EventNotificationMsg object, that notify ApAM that a new message has been released.

Returns:
nothing, it just notifies ApAM that a new message has been posted.
